inhale.name: Inhale
inhale.desc: Cancelling a wind spell stores its power in your lungs for 5 seconds, empowering the next wind spell cast in that time. All relevant modifications and upgrades from the inhaled wind mantra are applied to the empowered mantra. Inhaling a spell will cause the wind to be applied to your Basic Attacks.

breathing_impact.name: Breathing Impact
breathing_impact.desc: Knocking enemies into objects with wind spells deals additional blunt damage based on how hard they're hit.

after_cut.name: After Cut
after_cut.desc: If an attack is physical and wind it will apply an after cut that does 10% of the damage you dealt. If the attack was a mantra, it does 5% damage instead.
